categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Foremost was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer in service to the Galactic Empire's naval forces. The Foremost joined other members of Admiral Carlou Gendling's task force, including the Thunder Wasp and two Raider-class corvettes during the battle over Umbara. Umbaran insurgents sent vulture droids to attack Gendling's squadron, including the Foremost.
